parameters.name: IntersectionsToExclude
parameters.description: Array of booleans indicating which bodies returned by IFeatureManager::PreIntersect to exclude from this intersect feature

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge all intersect regions into one body, false to not

parameters.name: Consume
parameters.description: True to remove input surfaces from the FeatureManager design tree, false to not

title: IFeatureManager.PostIntersect
signature:
Feature PostIntersect( 
   System.Object
IntersectionsToExclude
,
   System.Boolean
Merge
,
   System.Boolean
Consume
)

parameters.name: IntersectionsToExclude
parameters.description: Array of booleans indicating which bodies returned by IFeatureManager::PreIntersect to exclude from this intersect feature

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge all intersect regions into one body, false to not

parameters.name: Consume
parameters.description: True to remove input surfaces from the FeatureManager design tree, false to not

remarks:
Before calling this method, you must call
IFeatureManager::PreIntersect
to obtain the intersect bodies.
